2. Service Functionality

Grounded. provides a service to help users track sustainable habits (such as travel methods, commute patterns, exercise, screen time, energy usage) and earn points based on these activities. These points may be redeemable for rewards offered by us or our third-party partners.

Accuracy of Data: The Service relies on data collected from your device (e.g., location services) and potentially connected third-party services. While we strive for accuracy, we cannot guarantee the perfect precision of tracked data or point calculations. Factors like device settings, GPS availability, and API limitations can affect accuracy.

Rewards: Reward availability, redemption value, and partner participation are subject to change without notice. We are not responsible for the products or services offered by our reward partners.
